title: What FPS/ping do you play on and what rank are you?
body:
What FPS/ping do you play on and what rank are you?

I feel like there is a direct correlation between fps/ping and ranks. In Challenger, all the players I know have above 60 fps and a stable internet connection, and low Bronze having poor framerates and ping. 

I play on constant 30 fps and 60 ping, and am Diamond IV in Solo Queue. Do you guys think FPS and ping have a strong influence on your rank and gameplay?
